nodes.text: Baes Logia was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories. During the Galactic Civil War, the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance were engaged in a campaign there. The Alliance tried to capture an Imperial general alive on Baes Logia, but the general was killed by the insane Graf Yonna. Tamo Lan served the Alliance on Baes Logia, before serving at Massassi Station.
